cell.text: 2.1. Control of Breathing Rate (breaths per minute)
2.2 Control of Tidal Volume (air volume pushed into lung in mL)
2.3 Control of I/E Ratio (inspiratory/expiration time ratio)
best if adjustable between range of 1:1–1:4

5. Ability to use ventilation on room air.

6. HEPA filtration on the patient’s exhalation
Required because COVID-19 can be aerosolized
